Chiyo, Matsuomaru's wife

(女房千代) (Nyōbō Chiyo)

Authority Control:
May 1972 Program; Kabuki tōjō jinbutsu jiten (Tokyo: Hakusuisha, 2006)

Plays:

Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy (菅原伝授手習鑑)
